title: Integrity
verses: Proverbs 10:9 (WEB) — “He who walks blamelessly walks surely.”
Proverbs 11:3 (WEB) — “The integrity of the upright shall guide them.”
Psalm 15:2 (WEB) — “He who walks blamelessly and does what is right.”
Titus 2:7 (WEB) — “Show yourself an example of good works… in your teaching show integrity.”
body: Integrity is wholeness—your private and public life aligned with Christ. Choose truth, keep your word, and do the right thing even when unseen.
prayer: God who sees, make me whole and honest. Align my heart and habits with Your truth. Strengthen me to do what’s right. Amen.
